title: Strange issues with ping spikes/lag?
body: So I'm having some really frustrating issues with ping/lag issues. My ping stays at a constant around 63-65 most of the time, however every minute or so the game just freezes for maybe 2-3 seconds, after that the ping is around 220 and then falls back down to 65. My first thought was that there was something wrong with my internet but my roommate has been playing league with no issues whatsoever. I've already tried re-installing league and not really sure what to do from here, just wondered if anyone had a similar experience and were able to change it

replies.body: Same here, the game just freezes on me and inputs are delayed every minute or so ever since I updated the game yesterday.

> [{quoted}](name=Puno510,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kvJMh2Rx,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-09-24T19:56:31.696+0000)
>
> Same here, the game just freezes on me and inputs are delayed every minute or so ever since I updated the game yesterday.

I'm having the same problem with delayed inputs... it delays for 1-2 seconds once in a while and causes me to walk straight into enemies or let kills get away. Sad :(
Interestingly enough, I connected to my schools wifi today and tried pinging the server via command prompt. The same thing happened where every now and then it would have a crazy spike

"Your average ping was 76 milliseconds.

The worst ping you experienced was 410ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this." 

"Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 6.59%.

Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss."
That is crazy, I don't have these problems in other games.

I had a similar message although not as extreme, my average was around 70 and went to 295, I'm going to look at the solutions but it's weird because although it claims there is a problem with my connection, as I have stated before, my roommate runs league without these problems on the same connection. I will try the suggestions anyway though

It seems like your network is having some trouble maintaining a strong connection, and possibly suffering from packet loss which can cause lag spikes like that.    Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to find out what's going on with your network.  The results should also provide you with a list of troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I dont think there is anything wrong with our networks. LoL is the only game that I have this problem on, I usually average 30-40 ping but lately its been crazy high sometimes up to 400 ping. Knowing your game, theres probably something wrong on your side or something malfunctioning in both sides.

Me too, the past 3 days.  My ping is fluctuating between 40-80 with bad spikes every few minutes at 200-300.

My controls will lag by 1-2 seconds frequently.
I've been having ping to 30-40 and when i suddenly get HUGE lags it goes up to exactlty 71, doesn't move a bit and just creates huge amount of lag/delays...

I been having the same issue along with my fps messing up it comes to a point where i cant even move with my ping and get killed because of it.... its getting annoying  i had to do a ticket and do the hextech repair tool i havent heard anything back but hopefully it can be looked at.
Same here, I used to have low ping. Then out of nowhere I started playing and my ping would just spike up to like 400 for a while and freeze sometimes. League is the ONLY  game my ping is high on.
